all: We do not have any stats for this player.

bio: One of a handful of players with 700+ doubles wins... All-American at Lamar University... Known for his powerful service return... Was the overall Grand Prix Doubles Points champion in 1979 and 1982... Won 1982 ATP Doubles Team of the Year Award (w/Taygan)... Residence: The Woodlands, Texas... Wife, Linda; Daughter, Shastyn.

Best Grand Slam Results: Roland Garros Doubles Champion: 1983 (w/Edmondson) and 1976 (w/McNair), Runner-up 1983 (w/Edmondson); Australian Open Doubles Champion: 1984 (w/Edmondson), Runner-up 1983 (w/Denton); Runner-up U.S. Open Doubles 1978 (w/Riessen).
